mdRecord.dcterms:description: The papers consist of topical files, personal, professional, and financial files, photographs, glass lantern slides, photographic slides, negatives, card indexes, and printed materials.
Specialist in education in the Southern states, interracial issues, and education in Africa.
Exhibited January 20 – April 20, 2019 — Everyday People, Small Special Collections Library
